sentences.sContent: They run a small grocery store.
sentences.sCn: 他们经营一家小食品杂货店。

sentences.sContent: ...You don't have to hit the grocery store daily...
...The common prescription is to primarily shop the grocery store...
...But there is plenty of decent food in the grocery stores...
...M：Do you think I could borrow your car to go grocery shopping...
...She walked to the local grocery store to buy broken biscuits which were much cheaper...
...Do you think I could borrow your car to go grocery shopping...
...ranked second and third were grocery and electronics customers...

trans.tranOther: food and other goods that are sold by a grocer or a supermarket
